Instruction: Put the chopped chocolate in a large stainless steel bowl.

Heat cream and butter in a large, high-sided saucepan over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally until just about to boil. Be cautious, as it can quickly boil over the pan. Remove from heat immediately and pour over the chopped chocolate.
Stir until all the chocolate has melted and the mixture is smooth. Allow it to cool to room temperature before refrigerating. Ganache can be reheated using a double boiler over simmering water.
